mapper.select: select rt.rtid, rt.rtdate from location l, runningtimetable rt where rt.lid = l.lid and rt.mid = #{mid} and rt.lid = #{lid} group by rt.rtid, rt.rtdate
select to_char(rtdate,'HH24:MI')rttime,rtid from runningtimetable where rtdate = (select rtdate from runningtimetable where rtid = #{rtid})

select rt.*, to_char(rtdate,'HH24:MI') rttime, m.mtitle, l.lname, t.tname from movie m, location l, runningtimetable rt, theater t where rt.lid = l.lid and rt.mid=m.mid and rt.tid = t.tid and rtdate = (select rtdate from runningtimetable where rtid = #{rtid})
